PlantDef.Label: agave
PlantDef.Description: A large-leafed desert plant with edible flowers and stalks.

PlantDef.Label: saguaro cactus
PlantDef.Description: A large cactus native to arid Earth environments. Though it is not a tree, it yields a small amount of fibrous material that can be used like wood.

PlantDef.Label: drago tree
PlantDef.Description: A hardy desert tree topped with thick, pointed leaves.

PlantDef.Label: palm tree
PlantDef.Description: A tropical tree with a tall, naked trunk topped by a cluster of very broad leaves. Unfortunately, this variety doesn't produce any edible coconuts.
